POINT_1.TITLE: Only you can access your data
POINT_1.TEXT: All form responses are either encrypted end-to-end (Storage mode) or sent directly to your email inbox (Email mode). This means third parties will not be able to access or view your form data.

POINT_2.TITLE: Support up to Restricted data for individual responses
POINT_2.TEXT: For individual responses classified Restricted and below, you can use FormSG in either Storage or Email mode.

POINT_3.TITLE: Support up to Confidential data for collated responses
POINT_3.TEXT: Both Storage and Email modes are permissible for collated data classified Restricted and below, and Email mode can also be used for Confidential collated data.

POINT_1.TITLE: Control flow logic
POINT_1.TEXT: Show fields based on chosen options

POINT_2.TITLE: Acknowledgement emails
POINT_2.TEXT: Automatically email users after they submit their forms

POINT_1.TITLE: SingPass
POINT_1.TEXT: With the push of a button you can authenticate citizens filling in your form with SingPass Login

POINT_2.TITLE: CorpPass
POINT_2.TEXT: With the push of a button you can enable CorpPass Login on your form to authenticate companies

POINT_3.TITLE: MyInfo
POINT_3.TEXT: Select which MyInfo fields you want to collect. These fields will be pre-filled once citizens log in through SingPass

STORAGE_MODE.DISCLAIMER: We do not store any sensitive data you captured in your forms as data is encrypted end to end. No concerns with data security, or anonymisation.

FLOW.TEXT_1: Login to Formsg via Internet or Intranet
FLOW.TEXT_2: Create a new form and choose
FLOW.TEXT_3: Build and share form link with citizens
FLOW.TEXT_4: Upload your Secret Key and view your responses
FLOW.TEXT_5: Download your responses into an Excel

EMAIL_MODE.DISCLAIMER: We do not store any sensitive data you captured in your forms as data is directly transmitted to your email. No concerns with data security, or anonymisation.

FLOW.TEXT_2: Create a new form and choose Email mode
FLOW.TEXT_4: Collect responses in your government email
FLOW.TEXT_5: Collate responses into an Excel with our data collation tool

SIGN_UP_SECTION.HEADER: There is neither an onboarding process nor any installation required.
SIGN_UP_SECTION.SECONDARY: Sign up with your government email, and build your form in minutes. It's free and no approval is required. Together let's make the Singapore government paperless.
